text: @maddow @RobertJ92022975 This is a raw deal for Capt. Crozier. The Navy expected him to know more than they did about the virus. But if he can be denied reinstatement for not acting more quickly, why the hell can't we do the same for dt, who was briefed on the implications of Covid-19 and lied about it?
